Enable the following permissions for the app to function properly
The app needs notification access in order to read and intercept Snapchat Notifications
To effectively block Snapchat notifications, the app needs permission to always run in the background.
Some manufacturers optimize background processes extensively which can affect the working of the app. Set the battery setting to “Don’t Optimize”.
